actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works.
Reported to House from the Committee on Public Works with amendment, H. Rept. 93-210.
Measure passed House, amended, roll call #167 (260-100).
Referred to Senate Committee Public Works.

official_title: A bill authorizing further appropriations to the Secretary of the Interior for services necessary to the nonperforming arts functions of the John F. Kennedy Center for the Performing Arts.

summary.text: (LATEST SUMMARY) Authorizes to be appropriated for fiscal years 1974, 1975, and 1976 such sums as may be necessary for services necessary to the nonperforming arts functions of the John F. Kennedy Center for the Performing Arts.

titles.title: A bill authorizing further appropriations to the Secretary of the Interior for services necessary to the nonperforming arts functions of the John F. Kennedy Center for the Performing Arts.
